医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
药物对细菌群落改变的肠道微生物组的影响许多人类药物可以直接抑制构成肠道微生物群的细菌的生长并改变其功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Drug-effects-on-gut-microbiome-altered-by-bacterial-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Drug-effects-on-gut-microbiome-altered-by-bacterial-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56882a63-1cc0-4aa8-8b58-69ee8de3cb8e Tue, 24 Sep 2024 14:13:27 -0400 Drug effects on gut microbiome altered by bacterial communities
创新性 ALS 研究获得 2200 万美元实验药物资助佛罗里达州梅奥诊所获得了国家神经疾病和中风研究所 (NIDS) 的资助，开始一项创新研究，该研究将在六个月内为数百名肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 患者提供实验药物异丁司特。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Innovative-ALS-study-receives-2422-million-grant-for-experimental-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Innovative-ALS-study-receives-2422-million-grant-for-experimental-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6a5e19d-c30b-4a1c-9350-430fb1776fc0 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 14:03:43 -0400 Innovative ALS study receives $22 million grant for experimental drug
万斯改写了特朗普和奥巴马医改的历史俄亥俄州共和党参议员 JD 万斯 9 月 15 日在 NBC 的“会见媒体”节目中告诉观众，前总统唐纳德·特朗普制定了《平价医疗法案》，尽管特朗普本可以选择相反的做法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Vance-rewrites-history-about-Trump-and-Obamacare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Vance-rewrites-history-about-Trump-and-Obamacare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f61867c-09ef-4576-a285-fdb75030747b Tue, 24 Sep 2024 13:51:16 -0400 Vance rewrites history about Trump and Obamacare
PRP 卵巢内注射可改善小鼠模型囊胚的数量和质量一篇新的研究论文发表在 Aging（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 17 期，题为“Intraovarian PRP”在化疗引起的卵巢储备功能下降的小鼠模型中，注射可改善卵母细胞质量和早期胚胎发育。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/PRP-intraovarian-injection-improves-the-number-and-quality-of-blastocysts-in-mouse-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/PRP-intraovarian-injection-improves-the-number-and-quality-of-blastocysts-in-mouse-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1889d7ee-6cf0-43f1-876b-144bc5c80f51 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 13:46:04 -0400 PRP intraovarian injection improves the number and quality of blastocysts in mouse models
创新的 HiTIP-seq 方法推进儿童脑肿瘤的表观遗传学研究弥漫性中线胶质瘤 (DMG) 是一种高度侵袭性和致命性的儿童高级胶质瘤，主要影响中枢神经系统的关键区域，如脑桥、丘脑和脊髓。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Innovative-HiTIP-seq-method-advances-epigenic-research-in-pediatric-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Innovative-HiTIP-seq-method-advances-epigenic-research-in-pediatric-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1be5cf3c-93b6-4dbd-a63d-1d7ea689f74c Tue, 24 Sep 2024 13:37:25 -0400 Innovative HiTIP-seq method advances epigenetic research in pediatric brain tumors
呼吸分析有望快速诊断下呼吸道感染一项概念验证研究有望通过分析人类呼吸来快速诊断下呼吸道感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Breath-analysis-promises-rapid-diagnosis-of-lower-respiratory-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Breath-analysis-promises-rapid-diagnosis-of-lower-respiratory-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7da927f-47e9-49ab-b647-c02a7ec73990 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 13:30:06 -0400 Breath analysis promises rapid diagnosis of lower respiratory infections
石墨烯的突破为对抗抗生素耐药性感染带来了希望石墨烯具有很强的杀菌特性，有可能成为对抗抗生素耐药细菌的游戏规则改变者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Graphene-breakthrough-offers-hope-against-antibiotic-pressive-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Graphene-breakthrough-offers-hope-against-antibiotic-pressive-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94281b76-4c0a-4bf2-a445-f06f7f1c592a Tue, 24 Sep 2024 13:22:48 -0400 Graphene breakthrough offers hope against antibiotic-resistant infections
研究发现食品接触材料中存在近200种潜在乳腺癌致癌物研究发现，包括塑料和纸张在内的食品接触材料中存在近 200 种潜在的乳腺癌致癌物，这凸显了尽管存在监管，但其广泛接触的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-finds-nearly-200-potential-breast-carcinogens-in-food-contact-materials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-finds-nearly-200-potential-breast-carcinogens-in-food-contact-materials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35b7b00a-9d7f-40bf-a598-f7f531202c76 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 13:15:11 -0400 Study finds nearly 200 potential breast carcinogens in food contact materials
确定治疗退伍军人创伤后应激障碍的神经刺激目标由麻省总医院布莱根医疗系统创始成员布莱根妇女医院的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，对特定大脑网络使用神经刺激疗法可以治疗退伍军人的创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Neurostimulation-target-identified-for-treating-PTSD-in-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Neurostimulation-target-identified-for-treating-PTSD-in-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d874b335-8dba-4d64-8f97-0a8dec47025c Tue, 24 Sep 2024 11:03:48 -0400 Neurostimulation target identified for treating PTSD in veterans
互联网搜索预测 COVID-19 期间 ADHD 药物处方在《Brain Medicine》（Genomic Press）上发表的一项开创性研究中，UCI 研究人员发现了 ADHD 药物的互联网搜索量与 COVID-19 大流行期间的实际处方率之间存在惊人的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Internet-searches-predict-ADHD-medication-prescriptions-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Internet-searches-predict-ADHD-medication-prescriptions-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27261fa2-100a-4e5a-be71-592f40675c10 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 10:59:37 -0400 Internet searches predict ADHD medication prescriptions during COVID-19
